abstract: Buyers and sellers of New York City properties near development sites must remain on top of information about construction plans that could affect property values; public records, real estate Web sites and reliable real estate blogs can ensure that the first news of a high-rise going up next door is not the arrival of a demolition crew.
snippet: Information is available to homeowners who are wondering if the building going up next door is going to become a window-darkening neighbor.
lead_paragraph: Information is available to homeowners who are wondering if the building going up next door is going to become a window-darkening neighbor.

headline.main: Is That a Bulldozer I Hear?
headline.print_headline: Is That A Bulldozer I Hear?
headline.seo: Is That a Bulldozer I Hear?
